name: checkmate-mcp
description: MCP server for Checkmate AI-powered test execution

scripts.build:ui: npm run build:ui:projects && npm run build:ui:test-cases && npm run build:ui:test-runner && npm run build:ui:cleanup
scripts.build:ui:projects: INPUT=ui-src/projects.html vite build && mv ui/ui-src/projects.html ui/projects.html
scripts.build:ui:test-cases: INPUT=ui-src/test-cases.html vite build && mv ui/ui-src/test-cases.html ui/test-cases.html
scripts.build:ui:test-runner: INPUT=ui-src/test-runner.html vite build && mv ui/ui-src/test-runner.html ui/test-runner.html
